name: Basket Bottle Flip Endless Bottle Flipping Arcade
name_original: Basket Bottle Flip Endless Bottle Flipping Arcade
description:
Play the #1 Bottle Flip Game on App Store now!

The viral bottle flipping trend has reached new heights!

Combining the best of two worlds, basketball and bottle flipping, you will become addicted to this new craze! Right in time to celebrate the new basketball season, flip and flick your bottles into the hoop! With four different game modes, you will be addicted and satisfied!

Download and play now!

How to Play
●Flick, flip, or swipe the bottle into the hoop!
●Test your accuracy and coordination with 4 different game modes!
●Unlock 30 new bottles with the prize machine!
●Beat your high scores in Endless, Time Challenge, Bounce, and Multi Hoops!

Features
●Sleek and minimalist graphics
●Easy to use and play UI
●Casual game that is perfect for all ages

Don't wait now, download and play now!

Follow us for updates and new games!
